Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 nee Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Varavazhaiththu, Vasthirangalaiyum, Abishega Thailaththaiyum, Paavanivaaranapalikku Oru Kaalaiyaiyum, Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Oru Koodaiyil Pulippillaa Appangalaiyum Konduvandhu,
3 sabaiyaiyellaam Aasarippuk Koodaara Vaasalukku Munbaagak Koodivarachchey Endraar.
4 karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Mose Seydhaan: Sabai Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalukku Munbaagak Koodinapodhu,
5 mose Sabaiyai Nokki: Seyyumpadi Karththar Kattalaiyitta Kaariyam Idhuve Endru Solli,
6 karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Mose Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Varavazhaiththu, Avargalai Jalaththinaal Snaanampannuviththu,
7 avanukku Ullangiyaip Pottu, Idaikkachchaiyaik Katti, Melangiyai Uduththi, Epoththaith Thariththu, Adhinmel Epoththin Visiththiramaana Kachchaiyaik Katti,
8 avanukku Maarppadhakkaththai Anindhu, Maarppadhakkaththile Ooreem Thummeem Enbavaigalaiyum Vaiththu,
9 avan Thalaiyile Paagaiyaith Thariththu, Paagaiyinmel Avan Netriyile Parisuththa Kreedam Ennum Porpattaththaik Kattinaan.
10 pinbu Mose, Abishega Thailaththai Eduththu, Vaasasthalaththaiyum Adhilulla Yaavatraiyum Abishegampanni, Parisuththappaduththi,

11 adhil Konjam Eduththu, Palipeedaththinmel Ezhudharam Theliththu, Palipeedaththaiyum Adhin Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum, Thottiyaiyum Adhin Paadhaththaiyum Parisuththampaduththumpadikku Abishegam Panni,
12 abishegathailaththile Konjam Aaronudaiya Sirasinmel Vaarththu, Avanaip Parisuththappaduththumpadi Abishegampanninaan.
13 pinbu Mose, Karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Aaronin Kumaararai Varavazhaiththu, Avargalukku Angigalai Uduththi, Idaikkachchaigalaik Katti, Kullaakkalaith Thariththu,
14 paavanivaarana Palikkaana Kaalaiyaik Konduvandhaan; Adhinudaiya Thalaiyinmel Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Thangal Kaigalai Vaiththaargal;

15 appozhudhu Adhu Kollappattadhu; Mose Adhin Raththaththai Eduththu, Than Viralinaal Palipeedaththin Kombugalinmel Sutrilum Poosi, Palipeedaththirkaagap Praayachchiththancheydhu, Matra Raththaththaip Palipeedaththin Adiyil Ootrivittu, Adhinmel Paavanivirththi Seyyumporuttu Adhaip Parisuththappaduththinaan.

16 pinbu Mose, Karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Kudalgalmel Irundha Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum, Kalleeralinmel Irundha Javvaiyum, Irandu Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Avaigalin Kozhuppaiyum Eduththu, Palipeedaththinmel Thaganiththu,
17 kaalaiyaiyum Adhin Tholaiyum Maamsaththaiyum Saaniyaiyum Paalayaththukkup Purambe Akkiniyile Sutteriththaan.
18 pinbu Avan Sarvaanga Thaganapalikku Aattukkadaavaikkonduvandhaan; Adhin Thalaiyinmel Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Thangal Kaigalai Vaiththaargal.
19 appozhudhu Adhu Kollappattadhu; Mose Adhin Raththaththaip Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Theliththaan.
20 aattukkadaa Sandhu Sandhaagath Thundikkappattadhu; Karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Mose Adhin Thalaiyaiyum Thundangalaiyum Kozhuppaiyum Thaganiththaan.
21 kudalgalaiyum Thodaigalaiyum Thanneeraal Kazhuvinapin, Mose Aattukkadaa Muzhuvadhaiyum Palipeedaththinmel Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaikkaana Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagath Thaganiththaan.
22 pinbu Pradhishtaippaduththuvadharkuriya Matra Aattukkadaavaik Konduvandhaan; Adhin Thalaiyinmel Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Thangal Kaigalai Vaiththaargal.
23 pinbu Adhu Kollappattadhu; Mose Adhin Raththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Aaronudaiya Valadhu Kaadhin Madalilum Valadhu Kaiyin Peruviralilum Valadhu Kaalin Peruviralilum Poosinaan.

24 pinbu Aaronudaiya Kumaararaiyum Azhaiththaan; Mose Andha Raththaththile Konjam Avargaludaiya Valadhu Kaadhin Madalilum Valadhu Kaiyin Peruviralilum Valadhu Kaalin Peruviralilum Poosi, Raththaththaip Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Theliththu,
25 kozhuppaiyum, Vaalaiyum, Kudalgalmelirundha Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum, Kalleeralinmelirundha Javvaiyum, Irandu Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Avaigalin Kozhuppaiyum, Valadhu Munnanthodaiyaiyum Eduththu,

26 karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Vaiththirundha Pulippillaa Appangalin Koodaiyilulla Pulippillaa Adhirasaththil Ondraiyum, Enneyitta Appamaagiya Adhirasaththil Ondraiyum, Oru Adaiyaiyum Eduththu, Andhak Kozhuppinmelum, Munnanthodaiyinmelum Vaiththu,
27 avaigalaiyellaam Aaronudaiya Ullankaigalilum Avan Kumaararudaiya Ullankaigalilum Vaiththu, Asaivaattumpaliyaagak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaatti,

28 pinbu Mose Avaigalai Avargal Ullankaigalilirundhu Eduththu, Palipeedaththinmelirukkira Thaganapaliyinmel Thaganiththaan; Avaigal Sugandhavaasanaiyaana Pradhishtaippaligal; Idhu Karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaanadhu.

29 pinbu Mose Maarkkandaththai Eduththu, Adhaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaattum Paliyaaga Asaivaattinaan. Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Pradhishtaiyin Aattukkadaavile Adhu Moseyin Pangaayitru.

30 mose Abishega Thailaththilum, Palipeedaththinmelirundha Raththaththilum Konjam Eduththu, Aaronmelum Avan Vasthirangal Melum, Avan Kumaararmelum Avargal Vasthirangalmelum Theliththu, Aaronaiyum Avan Vasthirangalaiyum, Avan Kumaararaiyum Avan Kumaararin Vasthirangalaiyum Parisuththappaduththinaan.

31 pinbu Mose Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Nokki: Neengal Andha Maamsaththai Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile Veviththu, Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Adhaip Pusippaargalaaga Endru Kattalaiyittirukkirapadiye, Ange Adhaiyum Ungal Pradhishtaip Paligalulla Koodaiyil Irukkira Appaththaiyum Pusiththu,
32 maamsaththilum Appaththilum Meedhiyaanadhai Akkiniyile Sutteriththu,
33 pradhishtaiyin Naatkal Niraiverumvaraikkum, Ezhunaal Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalai Vittup Purappadaadhirungal; Ezhu Naalalavum Neengal Pradhishtaippaduththappaduveergal.
34 indru Seydhadhupola, Ungal Paavanivirththikkaaga Inimelum Seyyavendum Endru Karththar Kattalaiyittaar.
35 neengal Saagaadhapadikku Ezhunaal Iravum Pagalum Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalilirundhu, Karththarudaiya Kaavalaik Kaakkakkadaveergal; Ippadi Naan Karpikkappatten Endraan.
36 karththar Moseyaikkondu Kattalaiyitta Ellaak Kaariyangalaiyum Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Seydhaargal.
